meta.name: For Jill — The Curated Wardrobe
meta.subtitle: Navy, stripes, cashmere, silk. Pieces with stories, makers with meaning.
meta.tagline: Quality over quantity. Craft over trend.
meta.hero_quote: Buy less, choose well, make it last.

products.name: Minquidame Breton Striped Shirt
products.description: Since 1889, Saint James has woven the same Breton stripes in Normandy that dressed Coco Chanel and Pablo Picasso. Navy meets écru in heavyweight cotton that softens with each wash.
products.maker: Saint James · Saint James, France · Since 1889
products.expected_content: navy and white striped breton shirt, classic French nautical style
products.search_query: Saint James Breton stripe navy white shirt

products.name: Cropped Cashmere Cocoon Cardigan
products.description: California ease meets quiet luxury. This cropped cardigan wraps you in Mongolian cashmere—a Sunday morning ritual in wearable form. Perfect for Green Lake walks.
products.maker: Jenni Kayne · Los Angeles, CA · Est. 2002
products.expected_content: ivory cropped cashmere cardigan sweater oversized
products.search_query: Jenni Kayne cropped cashmere cocoon cardigan ivory

products.name: Marin Stripe Sweater
products.description: Founded by former Vogue editors who believe stripes deserve their own brand. 7-ply cashmere-wool blend, oversized silhouette. La Ligne means 'the line'—and they've perfected it.
products.maker: La Ligne · New York City · Est. 2016
products.expected_content: navy and cream striped oversized cashmere sweater
products.search_query: La Ligne Marin sweater stripe navy cream cashmere

products.name: Silk Leather Cuff Shirt
products.description: Fewer, better things. Cuyana's philosophy in silk form—an elegant shirt with leather cuff detail. Sustainable luxury from a brand that believes in lasting pieces over fast fashion.
products.expected_content: black silk shirt leather cuff elegant

products.name: Bespoke Spectacles
products.description: London's answer to anonymous eyewear. Choose your shape, your color, your acetate. Hand-finished by British craftspeople. Bold frames for people who see the world differently.
products.search_query: Cubitts bespoke eyeglasses colorful acetate frames

products.name: One of One Custom Frames
products.description: Designed with you, finished by master artisans (MOF-certified) in France. Navy acetate, hand-engraved temples, a frame that exists only for you. Heirloom eyewear.
products.expected_content: French bespoke eyeglasses navy acetate frames
products.search_query: AHLEM one of one bespoke eyeglasses custom

products.name: Threadbare Ring
products.description: A whisper of 14k gold, hammered by hand in Brooklyn. Stack them, scatter them, wear them in the shower. The ring that started a movement—delicate but indestructible.
products.expected_content: thin delicate gold ring stackable hammered

products.name: Eli Scarf
products.description: Parisian warmth in navy knit. The Eli Scarf wraps around you like a thoughtful embrace—Sézane's signature sustainable cashmere blend that feels like coming home to Paris.
products.expected_content: navy knit scarf warm elegant French

products.name: Cashmere Travel Wrap
products.description: Two decades of cashmere obsession in every stitch. The iconic travel wrap that started it all—wear it as a scarf, blanket, or impromptu shawl at 30,000 feet.

products.name: Cropped Beadnell Waxed Jacket
products.description: The Barbour waxed jacket, made shorter and sharper. Navy/Classic with gold hardware—British heritage that looks at home on rainy PNW streets. Rewax it, repair it, keep it for decades.
products.expected_content: navy waxed cotton cropped jacket Barbour women
products.search_query: Barbour Cropped Beadnell waxed jacket navy

products.name: Brentwood Blazer
products.description: Navy, always. Tailored but never stiff, structured but never severe. The Brentwood blazer that works for coffee meetings and dinner reservations and everything between.
products.maker: Jenni Kayne · Los Angeles, CA · Est. 2002
products.expected_content: dark navy blue tailored women blazer jacket
products.search_query: Jenni Kayne Brentwood blazer dark navy women

products.name: The Demi Ballet Flat
products.description: Handmade in Spain from Italian nappa leather with 5mm plush foam padding. Navy nappa with black trim—the shoe Vogue is 'obsessed' with. 60 sizes, 3 widths, fits like it was made for you.
products.expected_content: navy and black ballet flat shoe leather elegant bow
products.search_query: Margaux Demi ballet flat navy black leather
